entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a student who is laughing and wiping tears from his face. He whispers 'Cheers' in the conversation.

entities.name: vanishing them
entities.description: Vanishing them refers to some kind of magical or explosive device that George mentions as something that someone might try next, but which multiplies by ten every time it's tried.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher who seems to be sardonic and calm in the face of the fireworks. She asks Miss Brown to inform the headmistress about an escaped firework.

entities.name: miss brown
entities.description: Miss Brown is a teacher who is asked by Professor McGonagall to run along and inform the headmistress about an escaped firework.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is the new headmistress who spends her first afternoon running around the school answering summonses from other teachers.

relationships.description: George mentions 'Vanishing them' as something that someone might try next, but which multiplies by ten every time it's tried.
